in_ports.name: contours
in_ports.hint: Existing contours: serialized array of several contours.

in_ports.name: object_label
in_ports.caption: object labels
in_ports.hint:
[Optional] If specified, these value overwrite object labels
in the headers of existing contours.

in_ports.name: internal_boundary
in_ports.caption: internal boundary indicators
in_ports.hint:
[Optional] If specified, these values overwrite indicator of internal contour
in the headers of existing contours (1 for internal contour, 0 for external contour).

controls.name: removeFrameId
controls.caption: Remove frame ID
controls.description: If set and if a contour has associated frame ID, it is removed. Allows to save space a little, if this ID is not necessary for further processing.

controls.name: reverseContours
controls.caption: Reverse contours
controls.description:
If set and if "internal boundary indicators" array is not specified, each internal contour is transformed into equivalent external one and vise versa. It means that new transformed contour consists of the same points, but in the reverse order. It leads to inversion of the indicator of internal contour (0 or 1).
This parameter is ignored when "internal boundary indicators" contains some array: in this case, each contour will be reversed if its new indicator differs from the existing one.
